eu.id3.face

Class DetectedFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.id3.face.DetectedFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DetectedFace
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Serializable
    This class represents a DetectedFace object of the Face module.
    See Also:

                                      int detectionScore,
                                      int id,
                                      PointList landmarks)
                               throws FaceException
        Creates a detected face from values.
        Parameters:
        bounds - Bounds of the detected face.
        detectionScore - Confidence score of the detected face.
        id - ID of the detected face.

        Created detected face.
        Throws:

      • getDistanceToCamera

        public int getDistanceToCamera(Image depthImage)
                        throws FaceException
        Gets the distance between the detected face and the camera when using a depth map in pixels.
        Parameters:
        depthImage - Depth image to process.
        Returns:
        Computed distance to camera in pixels.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • getInterocularDistance

        public int getInterocularDistance()
                           throws FaceException
        Gets the distance between the eyes (IOD) of the detected face in pixels.
        Returns:
        Computed interocular distance (IOD) in pixels.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • getPortraitBounds

        public Rectangle getPortraitBounds(float eyeImageWidthRatio,
                                   float eyeImageHeightRatio,
                                   float imageRatio)
                            throws FaceException
        Gets the portrait bounds of the detected face.
        Parameters:
        eyeImageWidthRatio - Ratio between eye distance and image width. Must be in the range ]0;1[. Default recommended value is 0.25.
        eyeImageHeightRatio - Ratio between eye distance to top and image height. Must be in the range ]0;1[. Default recommended value is 0.45.
        imageRatio - Ratio between image height and image width. Default recommended value is 1.33 (4/3).
        Returns:
        Portrait bounds of the detected face.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • rescale

        public void rescale(float scale)
             throws FaceException
        Rescales the detected face object bounding box and landmarks. This function can be useful if the image was downscaled to speed up detection, then you need to upscale the detected face to fit the source image size.
        Parameters:
        scale - The multiplicative rescaling factor to apply to the face object.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int angle,
                   Point center)
            throws FaceException
        Rotates the face object by a given angle in degrees from a given center.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle of the rotation to apply to the face object.
        center - Center of the rotation to apply to the face object.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String path)
          throws FaceException
        Saves the face object to a file.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the file to export the face object to.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.

                throws FaceException

      • translate

        public void translate(int tx,
                      int ty)
               throws FaceException
        Translates the face object.
        Parameters:
        tx - Translation to apply to the face object alongside the x-axis.
        ty - Translation to apply to the face object alongside the y-axis.
        Throws:
        FaceException - An error has occurred during Face Library execution.
